name: Try to speedrun this!
description:
The goal of the game is to parkour through the map with the help of power ups. You can also pet the enemies and control their movement so that they can help you get to the destination.

How to download:

  1. Download the archive
  2. Unzip to a specified folder
  3. Double click on "VGDC GameJam.exe" file

Post you best time  in the comments.

This game was created by a group of three:

  • Nicolae Filat https://itch.io/profile/nickk2002
  • Alex Petrescu https://github.com/MetalBoy2050
  • Piotr Cichoń https://github.com/p31ikan
